Yggdrasil shook his head.

Yggdrasil: Not if they're as prepared as they seem to be. My theory is
that they'll wipe out the Preds then turn to us. They are definitely
dangerous and we can't think they'll grind themselves to death on
something as unthreatening as the Preds.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>"
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Devilcat::
> 
> "Perhaps if we could trick the Predacons and Tripredacus into 
> fighting each other, it would weaken both groups, giving us an 
> advantage." Devilcat suggests.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: I would very much like that solution. Of course 
> nothing is that easy, especially dealing with Hydras.
